featured.text: Getting a flu shot before the start of flu season gives our body a chance to build up protection against the that could make us sick.

definition.zh_def: 流感是一種由流感病毒引起的傳染病，通常伴隨發燒、咳嗽、喉嚨痛和全身不適等症狀。
definition.en_def: Flu is an infectious disease caused by the influenza virus, typically characterized by fever, cough, sore throat, and body aches.
definition.example: She stayed home from work because she had the flu.
